programs.content:
### Spring 2021 Training

This is a great program for intermediate to advanced level skiers. Intermediate-Advanced would be skiers who need improvements in strength and technique. All sessions include technique, ski drills, and distance in the Spring.

### Summer 2021 Training

The 9 week summer program will begin June 14th and end on August 14th.\
Most sessions will include technique and distance. Wednesday sessions will focus more on intervals and speed. See table at the bottom of this page for the complete summer training schedule.

*\* A $50 late fee will be added to registrations made after May 10th*

##### Program Cost

* 1 day per week  $250
* 2 day per week  $350
* 3 days per week $450
* 4 days per week $525
* Unlimited summer sessions $600

*We have eliminated the 2 days per week option as we feel people improve at a much faster rate when doing 3 or more sessions.*

##### Summer Strength Sessions 10 weeks

Tuesdays and Thursdays beginning June 8th-August 12th. This is a great way to get much stronger. Embrace North in Edina. This will be two days per week on Tuesday and Thursday Afternoons. The session will be about 50 minutes long. Cost is $250 for 9 weeks of summer strength training.

### Year-round training program

The year-round training program would include training in the Spring through Winter. Athletes can take a look at all options and get a discount if they plan on doing 1 session in the Spring, 3 in the Summer, 1 in the Fall-Winter.
